original_text: And as he was worshiping in the house of Nisroch his god, Adrammelech and Sharezer, his sons, struck him down with the sword and escaped into the land of Ararat. And Esarhaddon his son reigned in his place.
korean_text: 그가 그의 신 니스록의 신전에서 경배할 때에 아드람멜렉과 사레셀이 그를 칼로 쳐죽이고 아라랏 땅으로 그들이 도망하매 그 아들 에살핫돈이 대신하여 왕이 되니라

sentences.original_text: as he was worshiping in the house of Nisroch his god
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 니스로그 자기 신의 집에서 경배할 때에

sentences.original_text: struck him down with the sword
and escaped into the land of Ararat.
And Esarhaddon his son reigned in his place.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들 에사르하돈이 대신하여 왕이 되었다
